sentences.english: Data from preclinical studies of zoledronic acid suggest its definite anti-tumor effect.
sentences.chinese: 多个临床前研究显示唑来膦酸具有明确的抗肿瘤作用。

sentences.english: The calcium tolerance of phosphonic acid is lower than polymer type scale inhibitors.
sentences.chinese: 有机膦酸的钙容忍度低于聚合物防垢剂。

sentences.english: Trimethylphosphine forms the more stable complexes .
sentences.chinese: 三甲基膦形成更稳定的化合物。

sentences.english: Trialkyphosphine oxides(TRPO) is an extractant used in the treatment of high level liquid waste.
sentences.chinese: 三烷基氧化膦是用于处理高放废液的萃取剂。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the experience of pamidronate for osteogenesis imperfecta.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结帕米膦酸钠在成骨不全症中的应用经验。

sentences.english: In this article, we reviewed the progress of zoledronic acid in treating cancer bone metastases.
sentences.chinese: 本文综述了唑来膦酸治疗恶性肿瘤骨转移的研究进展。

sentences.english: To evaluate the anti-osteoporosis effect of alendronate and raloxifene on bone in rat model.
sentences.chinese: 评价阿仑膦酸钠与雷洛昔芬对牙槽骨吸收的防治作用。

sentences.english: Glufosinate is a phosphorus containing amino acid.
sentences.chinese: 草铵膦本身就是一种含磷的氨基酸。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To establish a HPLC method for the determination of zoledronic acid and its preparations.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立高效液相色谱测定唑来膦酸及其制剂含量。

sentences.english: In this paper, A new and simple synthetic method of phenylphosphonic dichloride from direct oxidation of dichlorophenylphosphine was described.
sentences.chinese: 给出了二氯苯膦直接氧化合成苯膦酰二氯的方法。

sentences.english: In this paper, A new and simple synthetic method of phenylphosphonic dichloride from direct oxidation of dichlorophenylphosphine was described.
sentences.chinese: 给出了二氯苯膦直接氧化合成苯膦酰二氯的方法。

sentences.english: Phosphonate corrosion and scale inhibitors are extensively applied in circulating cooling water.
sentences.chinese: 有机膦酸类缓蚀阻垢剂广泛应用于循环冷却水中。

sentences.english: Similar methods are used with phosphonate buffers.
sentences.chinese: 类似的方法使用膦缓冲区。

sentences.english: Ethylenediamine tetra Methylenephosphonic acid is a new multidentate ligand.
sentences.chinese: 乙二胺四甲叉膦酸是一种新型多齿配合剂。
